Class YahtzeeInstance

java.lang.Object
yahtzee.YahtzeeInstance
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class YahtzeeInstance extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a saved instance of a Yahtzee game.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getPlayer1

      public YahtzeePlayer getPlayer1()
      Retrieves player 1 of the game instance.
      Returns:
      The YahtzeePlayer representing player 1.

    • getPlayer2

      public YahtzeePlayer getPlayer2()

      Returns:
      The YahtzeePlayer representing player 2.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public YahtzeePlayer getCurrentPlayer()
      Retrieves the current player of the game instance.
      Returns:
      The YahtzeePlayer representing the current player.

    • saveGame

      protected void saveGame()
      Saves the current game instance to a file.

    • loadGame

      public static YahtzeeInstance loadGame()
      Loads a saved game instance from a file.
      Returns:
      The YahtzeeInstance representing the saved game, or null if no saved game exists.
